about_the_game: In this unique string-pulling logic game, your entire case unfolds within Gregory’s cozy office. Examine a classic detective board full of clues, photos, and connections, dragging strings between them to reveal patterns, motives, and suspects. With each twist, more characters visit Gregory, adding to the mystery and perhaps even leading him astray.
detailed_description: In this unique string-pulling logic game, your entire case unfolds within Gregory’s cozy office. Examine a classic detective board full of clues, photos, and connections, dragging strings between them to reveal patterns, motives, and suspects. With each twist, more characters visit Gregory, adding to the mystery and perhaps even leading him astray.
name: Quacking The Case Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Step into the webbed feet of Detective Gregory Steel, Featherdale’s top duck detective, and unravel a feathered mystery in this quirky string-pulling logic game.
